item.title: 2021 11 13 There Is a Girl in Bath Robe All Morning
item.description: This morning when I was having breakfast, I noticed that my neighbor across the window was wearing a bath robe, back facing me, typing in her laptop. I had a quick look on her of course to immediately find out that she was most likely not wearing anything underneath. I went back to my breakfast, had another bite of my toast. Next second, Iâ€™m drifting my eyes to her again. She stood up, wide opened her robe and wrapped it across her shoulder and tucked it around her chest tightly this time, showing some curves that rewarded me for my close examine, all with her back facing me.
